tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE renewable_energy_sources (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_name VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    capacity FLOAT,
    utilization_percentage FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE SupplyChainUtilization (
    utilization_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_id INT NOT NULL,
    utilization_date DATE NOT NULL,
    quantity DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_source_id FOREIGN KEY (source_id) REFERENCES EnergySources(source_id)
);

CREATE TABLE energy_utilization (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    partner_id INT,
    source_id INT,
    utilization_percentage DECIMAL(5, 2) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (partner_id) REFERENCES supply_chain_partners(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (source_id) REFERENCES renewable_energy_sources(id)
);

CREATE TABLE SupplyChain (
	supply_chain_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	supplier_id INT,
	product_id INT,
	source_id INT,
	FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES Suppliers(supplier_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES Products(product_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (source_id) REFERENCES EnergySources(source_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Suppliers (
    supplier_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_name VARCHAR(255),
    supplier_location VARCHAR(100),
    supplier_rating INT,
    source_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (source_id) REFERENCES EnergySources(source_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    product_category VARCHAR(50),
    supplier_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES Suppliers(supplier_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    order_date DATE,
    order_quantity INT,
    product_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES Products(product_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Shipments (
    shipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    shipment_date DATE,
    delivery_status VARCHAR(20),
    order_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES Orders(order_id)
);
